Description:
Senior Technician - Heavy Equipment / Cranes - Kanoo MachineryDiagnostic tools in both workshop and field
Carry out all repairs to the highest of standards
Ensure that full functional tests are carried out after repairs are completed
Adhere to all safety standards while performing works
Able to correctly identify the parts required as per manuals as assist in placing ordersSkills
Skills:
Must be able to diagnose faults correctly and in the shortest possible time
Ability to troubleshoot both mechanical and electrical functions unsupervised using a laptop and related
Minimum 5 years of relevant experience maintaining different cranes
Must have a Diploma or equivalent qualification in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering
Good communication skills in English (verbal and written)
Must have detailed knowledge of all types of machines, and able to work unsupervised
Must have valid Saudi driving license
Expats must have Transferable Iqama
